description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9kfn","text":"Modified from Lippmeier et al. 2009; developed as part of the labyrinthulomycete JGI Community Sequencing Project and Gordon and Betty Moore Foundation Marine Microbial Eukaryote Transcriptome Sequencing Project (MMETSP)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Protist Research to Optimize Tools in Genetics (PROT-G)

manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"cfn9f","text":"Lippmeier, J.C., Crawford, K.S., Owen, C.B., Rivas, A.A., Metz, J.G. and Apt, K.E. (2009), Characterization of Both Polyunsaturated Fatty Acid Biosynthetic Pathways in Schizochytrium sp.. Lipids, 44: 621-630. https://doi.org/10.1007/s11745-009-3311-9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":168,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":209,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BEA36C7037CA11EE93150A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1007/s11745-009-3311-9"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fe0ji","text":"Grow up cells, collect, and freeze rapidly - preferably in liquid nitrogen. Store biomass at -80C if not extracting immediately. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d76um","text":"This protocol has worked so far for two different thraustochytrids (Aurantiochytrium limacinum ATCC MYA-1381, Schizochytrium aggregatum ATCC 28920) and two Aplanochytrium strains (PBS06 and PBS07). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":26},{"style":"italic","offset":110,"length":25},{"style":"italic","offset":156,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"845qf","text":"Prepare extraction buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ovd3","text":"100 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuero","text":"1.5 M NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ltp1","text":"50 mM Na2-EDTA pH 8.0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":8,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtic","text":"20 g per liter CTAB (cetyltrimethylammonium bromide)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o47n","text":"8 mg per ml DTT (dithiothreitol) - ADD FRESH JUST BEFORE USE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di6r","text":"(note, if you keep these stocks in glass bottles, first soak the bottles with 0.1 M NaOH to inactivate RNAses)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8fam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8upet","text":"Prepare Tris-equilibrated phenol, pH 4.5-4.8, by warming to 65 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44tb0","text":"Prepare acid phenol:chloroform:isoamyl alcohol (pH 4.5-4.8, 125:24:1) by warming to 65 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70o9","text":"Set up to incubate the extraction step at 65 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edbcv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"818bo","text":"Prepare 8M LiCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cegqs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hpia","text":"Chill 100% ethanol and 70% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgc79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nrr4","text":"Prepare TE or nuclease-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qtts","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m04l","text":"Get a bucket of ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4joj2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pa81","text":"Suspend ~1000 micrograms wet weight biomass per ~10 ml extraction buffer by vortexing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efugp","text":"(these amounts would yield tens of micrograms of total RNA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"31sl2","text":"Add an equal volume of isopropanol and incubate overnight at 4 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ma3n","text":"Incubate at 65 C for 5 minutes, mix by vortex or inverting 2 or 3 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f2nd","text":"Add equal volume hot (65 C) acid phenol/chloroform/isoamyl alcohol, votes to mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"396lm","text":"Incubate at 65 C for 5 minutes, mix by vortex or inverting 2 or 3 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3kgeo","text":"Cool the mixture in ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9g7ab","text":"Centrifuge to separate the phases 4 C, 6,000g, 15 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"71tk","text":"Move the top phase to a new tube, avoiding the interface","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8ksk","text":"If remaining DNA forms a large fluffy precipitate, remove by spooling onto glass rod","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1nqg","text":"Collect precipitate by centrifugation 4 C, 16,000g, 30 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhhb7","text":"(may require distributing the sample among several 1.5 ml microfuge tubes and/or multiple spins for each tube to process the volume)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ri72","text":"Wash each pellet with 0.5 ml ice-cold 75% ethanol twice, centrifuging 4 C 16,000g, 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bog3u","text":"Allow the pellets to air dry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r3ti","text":"Dissolve pellets in an appropriate volume, analyze by appropriate method (spectrophotometry, Bioanalyzer); store frozen at -80 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afreu","text":"If the RNA contains particulates that do not dissolve, they can be removed by centrifugation 4 C, 6,000g, 5 minutes and transferring the supernatant to a fresh tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68so2","text":"If the RNA contains large amounts of DNA or other contaminants, it can be removed by selectively precipitating the RNA with 17 microliters of 8M LiCl per 50 microliters RNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"stbl","text":"Incubate -20 C 60 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fe6n2","text":"Collect RNA by centrifugation 4 C, 16,000g, 20 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ri72","text":"Wash each pellet with 0.5 ml ice-cold 75% ethanol twice, centrifuging 4 C 16,000g, 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bog3u","text":"Allow the pellets to air dry","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80it0","text":"Dissolve pellets in an appropriate volume, analyze by appropriate method (spectrophotometry, Bioanalyzer); store frozen at -80 C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15v0c","text":"Even if the RNA does not have obvious DNA, a DNAse treatment step is nonetheless recommended","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Labyrinthulomycete total RNA extraction protocol - hot phenol
title_html: Labyrinthulomycete total RNA extraction protocol - hot phenol

versions.title: Labyrinthulomycete total RNA extraction protocol - hot phenol
versions.title_html: Labyrinthulomycete total RNA extraction protocol - hot phenol

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ft0aq","text":"Be super careful with hot phenol! It's near the boiling point of phenol, so just a little too hot can be explosive.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
